author: nd
msg: add regression test. This works in 1.3, but not in 2.x (yet)

author: nd
msg: fix include testsuite for 1.3. Some files are not parsable in 1.3 since
single directives require a space before end_seq. (e.g. <!--#endif -->).
Additionally errmsg4.shtml doesn't throw an error message. Perhaps we
should skip this in 1.3? (adjusted expectation for now)

author: grisha
msg: Apparently including other files while parsing is a bit more complicated
with flex - changed it to use push_buffer, and now include files don't
appear in strange places like at the end of the output.

author: stas
msg: remove the unused example section from t/conf/extra.conf.in, it made
an assumption that mod_auth is available

author: grisha
msg: Added a psp object which supports psp.set_error_page("blah.psp"). This is
